events.name: Android Meetup : Getting Started With Android Development
events.description:
• General programming practices - Git etc
• Introduction to Android Basics
• Mastering Layouts in Android

events.name: Android Weekly Meetup : Beginner
events.description:
Meetup will be all about the latest technologies & tools in Android development, industry best practices & sharing developer experiences. • Kotlin - New programming language
• RxJava - Asynchronous, event-based programming
• Dagger - Dependency Injection
• Material Design
• Support Libraries in Android
• Memory Leaks - LeakCanary

events.name: Mobile Sites Certification Study Jam
events.description:
Study Jams are back! Join us this Saturday,10th February for our Google Mobile Sites Study Jam where we'll be talking about:

• Why mobile sites matter
• Creating an effective mobile UX
• Improving mobile site speed
• Advanced web technologies like PWA and AMP

And at the end of the day:
• Attendees that complete the exam will receive a printable certificate to verify status as a certified mobile sites professional.
• Attendees will get a Google Partners public profile page listing their certification.
• Get a Free .me TLD domain from GitHub Education for a year.
• Get free hosting & SSL Certificate from NameCheap

What to bring
• Notebook, Laptop.

events.name: Firebase for Web Meetup
events.description:
Firebase RealTime Database
Firebase Storage
Firebase Authentication
Google Analytics
AdWords & AdMob

events.name: IWD (International Womens' Day) Extended Kisii; Building a New Horizon
events.description: International women’s Day is a day in which we acknowledge, support and celebrate women in our communities. Most of ladies in GDG Kisii having not been able to access the Google IWD Summit in Nairobi therefore we would like to bring this experience to Kisii so that they can be a part of this great opportunity, hosted by GDG and WTM Kisii. The theme topic for this event is Building a New Horizon. We will have powerful speakers who are creating milestones in the tech scene. For fans of IoT(The Internet of Things) and PWA (Progressive web apps), we will have practical skills sessions with the best speakers this side of the Sahara. Be there.

events.name: TensorFlow Dev Summit Extended & Machine Learning Study Jam
events.description:
Hello Devs!

During this year's Tensorflow Dev Summit Extended we’re super excited to bring Google's ‘Machine Learning Crash Course (MLCC)’ to Google Developer Group Kisii.

This session is intended for those who wish to learn about ML from a practical, applied perspective that will enable them to use machine learning within their everyday projects, and who wish to benefit from the power of TensorFlow wrapped in convenient higher-level abstractions. This is a great opportunity for professionals, entrepreneurs and students to gain some practical experience in ML and TensorFlow.

This meetup will be suitable for you, if:
You are at least somewhat familiar with Python. You don't need to be an expert.
Ideally, you know at least a little about linear algebra and calculus.

events.name: Google I/O Extended Kisii 2018
events.description: Google I/O Extended Kisii is an annual developer event held by Kisii local developer community to explore the latest developments in Google technology. We expect a highly technical, in-depth sessions focused on Web, Cloud, IoT , Android, Chrome, AI and more.

events.name: Africa's Talking : SMS, USSD & IoT Workshop
events.description: Are you a tech enthusiast or experienced developer building mobile solutions that run on SMS, Short codes, USSD? Stickler for writing robust and scalable code for your board? Does term IoT elicit an unconscious smile when you see or hear it?

events.name: Africa's Talking : SMS & USSD Workshop
events.description: Are you a tech enthusiast or experienced developer building mobile solutions that run on SMS, Short codes, USSD? Stickler for writing robust and scalable code for your board? Does term IoT elicit an unconscious smile when you see or hear it?

events.name: Firebase for Web 🌍
events.description:
Prerequisites
• JavaScript knowledge
• Basic HTML & CSS knowledge

Benefits
• Knowledge sharing
• Swag for every attendee
• Jetbrains licenses for all attendees

We shall discuss
* Firebase authentication
* Cloud hosting
* Cloud storage
* Cloud functions

We are focusing on quality rather than quantity hence we will offer very limited spots for workshops from now henceforth.

events.name: Firebase for Android 🔥
events.description:
Prerequisites
• Java knowledge
• Android Studio installed

Benefits
• Knowledge sharing
• Swag for attendees

We shall discuss
* Firebase authentication with federated services like Facebook, Google & Github
* Cloud firestore to store your users data asynchronously
* Cloud messaging to send targeted notifications to drive user engagement in your app
* AdMob to run ads and earn money from your apps

We are focusing on quality rather than quantity hence we will offer very limited spots for workshops from now henceforth.

events.name: Tech Women In Machine Learning and Data Science
events.description: This event is for women interested in Machine Learning and Data Science. They will meet to socialize, and to discuss machine learning and data science in an informal setting with the purpose of building a community around women in these fields.
events.how_to_find_us: See flyers and posters for more details

events.name: I/O EXTENDED 2019, KISII
events.description:
Google I/O 2019 is here, and we are so exicited to host the event in Kisii, Nyanza Region Kenya.
In this year event we will learn on google latest products and have a hands on workshops in different topics of google products.
This event content will cater from beginner developer to expert developer. It will give an opportunity to unlearn and get the knack of what is new in the industry. It will also give you the opportunity to meet and learn from great speakers in google and also from our country.
Mean while preen your ears for more updates about the event.
#i/o19 Extended #GDG kisii
events.how_to_find_us: Incase of any enquires please email @ beatricemasil123@gmail.com or message any of the organizers.

events.name: Kotlin Everywhere
events.description:
Come learn the essentials and best practices of Kotlin in Android, Google Cloud Platform, and multi-platform development.

What is Kotlin?
Kotlin is a modern and statically typed programming language targeting the JVM, Android, JavaScript & Native that will boost your productivity and increase your developer happiness.

Why Attend The Event?
Whether you’re a mobile developer learning Kotlin to build your first Android app, or you develop web applications and are looking for a modern, safe language to use in both your server-side code and the frontend, we've got you covered.

events.how_to_find_us: This event will be held in old moot court kisii university

events.name: Devfest Western Kenya 2019
events.description:
Wassup Guys!

DevFest is coming to Nyanza and Western Kenya, Yaaas.

We are honored to have our Devfest In Western Kenya, come November 2019.
We bring to you the finest Tech Gurus from Kenya who will enlighten, up-skill and inspire you with all the new and existing tech ideas, which will make your life easier hence happier as a developer.

We have got Kotlin, Android of things, IOT, Creative and Design Thinking Process, Firebase Android, Firebase Web, PWA, Flutter, Google Assistant and amazing speakers sessions all lined up for you.

Make sure you are part of this amazing journey as we always say 'Let's Build Better Together'.

See you then.

The agenda will be uploaded soon

events.name: ANGULAR-GETTING STARTED
events.description: Are you passionate about Web. Would you like to explore its framework? Angular is here for you. Get started building single page applications, enterprise application by applying the MVC architecture and many more tools. Join us for our Angular event! Together we'll work through Angular and will be able to get hands-on experience….. Bring with you a laptop and a charger. SEE YOU ALL!

upcoming.name: Firebase Study Jam for Web
upcoming.description:
Details
Wassup Guys!

Firebase Season is here. For all those who want to learn more about firebase for web, then this is the event for you. we will have people sharing there experiences, coding workshops and most important learn all there is about firebase for web.

Looking forward to see you all.
